about_the_game:
It is a fastly paced 2d action platformer game with the mixed of Castlevania and other classic games, followed by interesting puzzles. The aim of this game is to help Tigor in facing the center of earth’s harsh condition before reaching the Earth’s surface. This game has multiple endings which depends on the success of finishing all the challenges. Its game will have 40 levels. Each levels have different enemies and puzzles.

Also its game very useful to challenge your phobia and make you become a fearless man
detailed_description:
It is a fastly paced 2d action platformer game with the mixed of Castlevania and other classic games, followed by interesting puzzles. The aim of this game is to help Tigor in facing the center of earth’s harsh condition before reaching the Earth’s surface. This game has multiple endings which depends on the success of finishing all the challenges. Its game will have 40 levels. Each levels have different enemies and puzzles.

Also its game very useful to challenge your phobia and make you become a fearless man

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 4Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory, OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

name: Fearless Tigor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb video memory, shader model 3.0+
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
